divs: Sighting Detailsmy friends were driving between alfred and wellsville ny fri. oct5 about1130pm ,a very cloudy night. they witnessed 2 lights on a object that was best described of a circular saw blade and was going very fast across the sky
Summary: went across the sky within seconds and it was shaped like that of a circular saw blade
